websockets_security_key_info: Security key is used in order to generate urls that can't be guessed. String should be random.
websockets_listen_port_info: Port where WebSockets server will listen for incoming connection. Should not be taking by anything else, otherwise server will not start
websockets_listen_on_info: Address on which server will listen for incoming connections. Since usually some reverse proxy stands Ñˆn front (like Nginx) it is better to choose 127.0.0.1
